name.baseName: Salted vegetables, pickles, sweet and sour pickles, shrimp oil pickles, bran pickles ; Mustard, leafy vegetables, beans, onions and garlic, roots and tubers, squash heads ; Washing + pickling/salting + desalting + dehydration + soaking ; All sizes; NESPS2
盐渍菜、泡菜、糖醋渍菜、虾油渍菜、糟糠渍菜 ; 芥菜类、叶菜类、豆类、葱蒜类、根茎类、榨菜头 ; 水洗+腌制/盐渍+脱盐+脱水+渍制 ; 所有规模 ; 全国第二次污染普查数据

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: the treatment technology for the pollution of Western Pickled Vegetablesdidn't offered，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is k = operating time of waste gas treatment facilities (hours/year) / normal production time of waste gas pollution production section (hours/year)

technology.technologyDescriptionAndIncludedProcesse: the treatment technology for the pollution of Western Pickled Vegetablesdidn't offered，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is k = operating time of waste gas treatment facilities (hours/year) / normal production time of waste gas pollution production section (hours/year)
technology.technologicalApplicability: 该工业过程用于生产和保存各种腌制蔬菜，包括盐渍菜、泡菜、糖醋渍菜、虾油渍菜、糟糠渍菜等品种，如芥菜类、叶菜类、豆类、葱蒜类、根茎类。该过程包括水洗、腌制/盐渍、脱盐、脱水和浸泡，适用于食品保鲜行业内的各种规模生产。

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: 第二次全国污染源普查产排污核算系数手册（试用版）,四级代码1371文件，在完整版文件中第2634页

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: This dataset is derived from the Pollution Source Census Report and contains information on pollution emissions and related products. However, it does not include data on energy or chemical consumption, nor does it provide information on waste or co-product generation. When utilizing this dataset, please supplement the missing data based on actual conditions before use
该数据集来源于污染源普查报告，包含污染物排放及相关产品信息，但不包含能源或化学品消耗数据，也不提供废弃物或共生产物产生信息。在使用该数据集时，请根据实际情况补充缺失数据后再使用。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

common:referenceToPersonOrEntityGenerati.common:shortDescription: The data was created by the Office of the Second National Pollution Source Census of the Ministry of Ecology and Environment, and the data was organized by the TianGong Plan team for ILCD format
生态环境部第二次全国污染源普查工作办公室创建数据，天工计划团队常慧敏整理数据为ILCD格式

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses

exchange.generalComment: the treatment technology for the pollution of Waste waterdidn't offered，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is k = operating time of waste gas treatment facilities (hours/year) / normal production time of waste gas pollution production section (hours/year)
污染物指标工业废水量的末端治理技术未说明。原文件中描述污染物类别为废水，污染物指标为工业废水量，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流
源文件中描述为为盐渍菜、泡菜、糖醋渍菜、虾油渍菜、糟糠渍菜，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流
